meanings.sent1: The sky had a dawnlike glow as the sun began to rise.
meanings.sent2: The soft, dawnlike colors painted the horizon in the early morning.
meanings.sent3: She wore a dress in a dawnlike shade of pink that made her look radiant.
meanings.sent4: The music had a dawnlike quality, slowly building up like the first light of day.
meanings.sent5: The painter captured the dawnlike beauty of the landscape with delicate brushstrokes.

meanings.definition: Happening at or around the time of dawn.
meanings.sent1: The dawnlike chorus of birds woke me up gently every morning.
meanings.sent2: We enjoyed a dawnlike walk along the beach, feeling the cool breeze.
meanings.sent3: The dawnlike meeting was scheduled so early that most people were still asleep.
meanings.sent4: The dawnlike event marked the beginning of a new era for the town.
meanings.sent5: The dawnlike silence of the empty streets was both eerie and peaceful.
